code: import{useContext}from'react';import FoodAppContext from'../context/FoodAppContext';function useRecipes(history){var _useContext=useContext(FoodAppContext),handleClickDetail=_useContext.handleClickDetail;var location=history.location;var pathname=location.pathname;var recipes=pathname.split('/');var zero=0;var doze=12;var handleToDetail=function handleToDetail(id){handleClickDetail(id,recipes[1]);history.push("/".concat(recipes[1],"/").concat(id));};return[handleToDetail,recipes,zero,doze];}export default useRecipes;
